title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, embed, pull, list models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) for chatting with local models, now renamed “Open WebUI”.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps ollama with conversation memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as a GitHub-Copilot-like assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama providing sync & async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store to chat with documents.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface that talks to Ollama’s REST API for local LLM conversations.

title: ollama-nest
summary: Community-maintained NestJS module that injects Ollama client as a provider.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-chat-react
summary: Lightweight React component library for embedding Ollama chat widgets into web apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your notes.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-built C# SDK for .NET 6+ with chat, embed, and model management methods.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider to provision Ollama servers on AWS EC2 and GCP Compute with GPU support.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client generated from Ollama’s OpenAPI spec; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.
